title: Re-Dressed: Black Dandyism: a Cultural History, an interview with Monica L. Miller, Part II
itunes:title: Re-Dressed: Black Dandyism: a Cultural History, an interview with Monica L. Miller, Part II
description:
This week, we bring you part two of our 2018 interview with Monica L. Miller, author of the book Slaves to Fashion: Black Dandyism and the Styling of Black Diasporic Identity.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
